reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Vihaan: Accelerating the National HIV Response to achieve the 95-95-95 targets through a community led, rights-based, prevention to care approach

description.narrative: India - HIV - India HIV/AIDS Alliance - IHAA. This program has the following goals: Achieving zero new infections, zero AIDS-related deaths and zero AIDS related stigma & discrimination. The objectives of this program are: Reduce new infections by 80% by 2024. Ensure 95% of estimated PLHIV know their status by 2024. Ensure ART initiation and retention of 95% PLHIV for sustained viral suppression by 2024. Eliminate mother-to-child transmission of HIV and syphilis by 2020. Eliminate HIV/AIDS related stigma and discrimination by 2020. Facilitate sustainable NACP service delivery by 2024

title.narrative: IND-H-IHAA Program Agreement
IND-H-IHAA Program Agreement
IND-H-IHAA Program Agreement
IND-H-IHAA Implementation Letter 1
Coverage / Output indicator for IND-H-IHAA
TCS-Other 1: Proportion of PLHIV on ART received differentiated care & support services to retain them in treatment
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
TCS-other 3: Proportion of PLHIV who have at least one family member or sexual partner referred for HIV testing and received test result
TCS-other 2: Proportion of PLHIV lost to follow up (LFU) / MIS brought back to treatment
KP-other 3: Proportion of incidents of violence and harassment addressed within 24 hours
TCS-other 1: Proportion of PLHIV in active care(both on ART+ Pre ART) at ART centres received at least one of the Care & Support services provided by CSC
KP-other 2: Number of MTH already registered received at least two and more Pehchān services during the Reporting Period
KP-other 1: No of registered MTH counselled and tested for HIV and who received results
TCS-Other 2: Percentage of PLHIV who are lost to follow up (LFU) and missed to ART center tracked back with definite outcome
Percentage of people living with HIV initiated on ART who are screened for TB in HIV treatment settings
TCS-Other 1: Percentage of PLHIV who are lost to follow up (LFU) and missed to ART Centre tracked with definite outcome
Percentage of HIV-positive patients who were screened for TB in HIV care or treatment settings
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
KP Others-1: Percentage of key population identified at virtual platforms who received e-referral and accessed HIV related services during the reporting period
Percentage of people newly diagnosed with HIV initiated on ART
